entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:08 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:08 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
